fields.headline: The measure
fields.bodyText: Going up Vienna Marc Jacobs sent his design team there for inspiration Radcliffe jeans With cufflinks to adjust the length, so you can wear them with heels or flats. Genius! Patent leather This season it's the Prada wedge, next season Mulberry's Roxanne goes shiny, too Bare feet See Joss Stone in Vogue Michael Jackson courtroom recreations Oh my God, have you seen them? Best telly ever Going down Tweed Rapidly heading into can't-believe-we-ever-liked-it territory Knee-length boots with bare legs People, this is not a spring compromise, it's a disaster. When you ditch the tights, ditch the boots Boots over jeans See above. So very, very wrong for spring - and anyway, beginning to look very Sloaney yummy mummy ... Texting Kiefer S is right: you're avoiding the other person's reaction. It's good to talk Toe shame Yes, it's that open-toe shoe time of year. Give your sad, scabby tootsies a pedicure, pronto!
